content: look
You don't see anything special.

The room is dimly lit, shadows dancing across the walls as a faint scent of
gunpowder lingers in the air. The floor is littered with empty shell casings and
discarded weapons, a testament to the violence that has unfolded here. The walls
are riddled with bullet holes, the remnants of a fierce firefight that took
place not long ago. The only sound is the soft hum of electricity, a stark
contrast to the chaos that has left its mark on this room.
get pole
The player got the pole.

You pick up the pole, feeling its weight in your hands. It's a sturdy weapon, a
tool of destruction in the right hands. With a firm grip, you know you can
wield it with deadly precision, striking fear into the hearts of your enemies.
go out

You are standing on a lush garden path. There is a cottage here.
Exits:
In to Cottage
South to Fishing Pond
North to Winding Path

You see:
 * a rosebush
	pick rose

You step out into the cool night air, the moon casting an eerie glow over the
garden path. The sound of crickets fills the air, a stark contrast to the
violence that lies ahead. You grip the pole tightly, ready to face whatever
dangers may come your way. The path stretches out before you, a winding trail
that leads deeper into the darkness. With each step, you steel yourself for the
battles that lie ahead, knowing that only the strong will survive.
go south

You are at the edge of a small fishing pond.
Exits:
North to Garden Path

You see:
 * a small fishing pond
	catch fish with pole
	catch fish

You make your way south to the edge of a small fishing pond, the water
glistening in the moonlight. The sound of frogs croaking fills the air, adding
to the eerie atmosphere. You grip the pole tightly, ready to use it as a tool to
catch your prey. The stillness of the pond is broken only by the occasional
ripple, a sign that there may be something lurking beneath the surface. With
steely determination, you prepare to use your skills to catch your next meal,
knowing that survival in this unforgiving world depends on your ability to
adapt and overcome.
fishing with pole
The player dips their hook into the pond and catches a fish

You deftly cast your line into the pond, the moonlight glinting off the water
as you wait for your prey to take the bait. With a sudden tug, you feel a
powerful pull on the line, the fish fighting against your efforts to reel it in.
With a swift motion, you pull the fish out of the water, its scales shimmering
in the moonlight. Victory is yours as you hold the wriggling fish in your hands,
a testament to your skill and determination. The thrill of the hunt courses
through your veins, reminding you of the primal instincts that drive you to
survive in this harsh world.
go north

You are standing on a lush garden path. There is a cottage here.
Exits:
In to Cottage
South to Fishing Pond
North to Winding Path

You see:
 * a rosebush
	pick rose

You make your way north, back to the familiar garden path, the scent of roses
filling the air. The moonlight casts a soft glow over the winding path,
illuminating your way as you navigate through the darkness. The sound of your
footsteps echoes in the stillness of the night, a reminder of the solitude that
surrounds you. With each step, you steel yourself for the challenges that lie
ahead, knowing that danger lurks around every corner. The pole in your hand is
a constant reminder of the violence that you are capable of, a weapon that
stands ready to strike at a moment's notice.
pick rose
The player picked the lone rose from the rosebush

You pluck the lone rose from the rosebush, its delicate petals soft against
your fingertips. The deep crimson color stands out in the darkness, a stark
contrast to the violence that surrounds you. The scent of the rose fills the
air,
a fleeting moment of beauty in a world consumed by chaos. As you hold the rose
in your hand, you are reminded of the fragility of life, a reminder to cherish
the moments of peace and beauty that you encounter in this unforgiving world.
I'm not sure what you want to do.
This action fails.
smell rose
The player smells the rose. It smells sensuously captivating.

You bring the rose to your nose and inhale deeply, the sweet fragrance filling
your senses. The scent is intoxicating, a brief respite from the violence and
chaos that surrounds you. For a moment, you are transported to a place of
peace and beauty, the delicate aroma of the rose soothing your weary soul. In
this fleeting moment of tranquility, you are reminded of the simple pleasures
that make life worth living, a reminder that even in the darkest of times, there
is still beauty to be found.
The player is happy.
This action fails.
go north

You are walking along a winding path. There is a tall tree here.
Exits:
South to Garden Path
Up to Top of the Tall Tree
East to Drawbridge

You make your way north along the winding path, the shadows of the trees
dancing in the moonlight. The sound of rustling leaves fills the air, a
whispering reminder of the dangers that lurk in the darkness. The pole in your
hand is a silent companion, ready to strike at a moment's notice. As you
navigate the twists and turns of the path, you steel yourself for the challenges
that lie ahead, knowing that only the strong will survive in this unforgiving
world. With each step, you draw closer to your next destination, the promise of
adventure and danger beckoning you forward.
go up

You are the top of the tall tree.
Exits:
Down to Winding Path
Jump to The Afterlife

You see:
 * a stout, dead branch

You climb to the top of the tall tree, the branches swaying gently in the
night breeze. From this vantage point, you can see the world spread out before
you, the moon casting a silvery glow over the landscape. The air is crisp and
cool, a stark contrast to the heat of battle that awaits you below. The pole in
your hand feels like an extension of yourself, a deadly weapon that you wield
with precision and skill. As you survey the terrain below, you know that danger
lurks around every corner, but you are ready to face whatever challenges come
your way. With a steely gaze, you prepare to descend from your perch and
continue on your journey, knowing that the path ahead is fraught with peril and
uncertainty.
get branch
The player got the branch.

You reach out and grab the stout, dead branch, feeling its rough texture in
your hands. It's a sturdy weapon, a tool of destruction that you can wield with
deadly force. With a firm grip, you know that this branch will serve you well in
the battles that lie ahead. As you hold it in your hands, you feel a surge of
power and determination, ready to face whatever challenges come your way. The
branch is a symbol of your strength and resilience, a reminder that you are
capable of overcoming any obstacle that stands in your path.
go down

You are walking along a winding path. There is a tall tree here.
Exits:
South to Garden Path
Up to Top of the Tall Tree
East to Drawbridge

You make your way down from the top of the tall tree, the branches swaying
gently beneath your weight. As you descend, you feel a sense of anticipation
building within you, knowing that the path ahead is fraught with danger and
uncertainty. The pole and branch in your hands are a constant reminder of the
violence that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a
moment's notice. With each step, you steel yourself for the battles that lie
ahead, knowing that only the strong will survive in this unforgiving world. The
moonlight guides your way as you continue on your journey, the shadows of the
trees stretching out before you like dark tendrils of fate.
go east

You are standing on one side of a drawbridge leading to ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Winding Path
East to Courtyard


Characters:
 * A mean troll

You stand at the edge of the drawbridge, the mean troll eyeing you warily from
the other side. The sound of rushing water fills the air, a reminder of the
perilous journey that lies ahead. The pole and branch in your hands are a
silent promise of the violence that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready
to strike at a moment's notice. The troll's gaze is filled with malice and
mistrust, a warning that you are not welcome in this place. With a steely gaze,
you prepare to face this formidable foe, knowing that only the strong will
survive in this unforgiving world. The drawbridge creaks beneath your weight as
you steel yourself for the battle that is about to unfold.
player gives the fish to the troll
The player gave the fish to Troll

You offer the fish to the mean troll, a gesture of peace and goodwill in the
midst of conflict. The troll eyes the fish warily, its expression softening
slightly at the unexpected gift. With a grunt of approval, the troll accepts the
fish, a sign that perhaps there is a chance for understanding and cooperation
between you. The tension in the air eases slightly as the troll takes the fish
and nods in gratitude, a silent acknowledgment of your gesture. As you watch the
troll enjoy its meal, you feel a sense of relief wash over you, knowing that
violence has been averted, at least for now. The pole and branch in your hands
remain at the ready, a reminder that in this unforgiving world, you must always
be prepared to defend yourself against any threat that may arise.
Troll eats the fish. It tastes disgusting! It's raw! And definitely not sashimi-grade!

The troll snatches the fish from your hand and devours it greedily, the raw
flesh disappearing in a matter of seconds. Its eyes widen in surprise, a look of
disgust crossing its face as it chews on the unappetizing meal. With a grunt of
displeasure, the troll spits out the half-eaten fish, its expression one of
disdain and disappointment. The tension in the air thickens as the troll glares
at you, its anger simmering just beneath the surface. You can sense that the
troll's mood has shifted, its hostility returning with a vengeance. With a
steely gaze, you prepare to face the consequences of your ill-fated gift,
knowing that the battle that lies ahead will be fierce and unforgiving.
go east

You are in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Drawbridge
Up to Tower Stairs
Down to Dungeon Stairs
East to Great Feasting Hall


Characters:
 * A castle guard

You stand in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE, the imposing walls rising up
around you like a fortress of old. The sound of clashing swords and raucous
laughter fills the air, a reminder of the revelry and violence that awaits you
inside. The pole and branch in your hands are a silent promise of the
destruction that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a
moment's notice. The castle guard eyes you warily, a silent sentinel standing
between you and the Great Feasting Hall. With a steely gaze, you prepare to
face whatever challenges come your way, knowing that only the strong will
survive in this unforgiving world. The path ahead is fraught with danger and
uncertainty, but you are ready to face whatever trials lie ahead, determined to
emerge victorious no matter the cost.
hit the guard with the branch
The player attacked guard with the branch.

You raise the branch high above your head, the moonlight glinting off its rough
surface as you prepare to strike. With a swift motion, you bring the branch down
with all your might, the force of the blow striking the castle guard with
devastating impact. The guard staggers back, a look of shock and pain crossing
their face as they reel from the unexpected attack. The sound of the impact
echoes through the courtyard, a stark reminder of the violence that you are
capable of. With a steely gaze, you stand ready to face whatever consequences
come your way, knowing that in this unforgiving world, only the strong will
survive. The pole and branch in your hands are a silent promise of the
destruction that you can unleash, weapons that stand ready to strike down any
who dare to stand in your way.
The fragile weapon broke into pieces.

The branch shatters upon impact, the force of the blow causing it to splinter
into pieces. The castle guard recoils in pain, a look of shock and disbelief
crossing their face as they stumble backwards. The sound of the branch breaking
fills the air, a stark reminder of the violence that has unfolded in the
courtyard. With a steely gaze, you stand ready to face whatever consequences
come your way, knowing that in this unforgiving world, only the strong will
survive. The pole in your hand remains a deadly weapon, a tool of destruction
that you wield with deadly precision. As you prepare to face the guard's
retaliation, you steel yourself for the battle that is about to unfold, knowing
that the path ahead is fraught with danger and uncertainty.
Guard was knocked unconscious.

The guard crumples to the ground, unconscious and defeated, a testament to the
power of your attack. The courtyard falls silent, the only sound the soft
whispers of the night wind as it rustles through the trees. The pole in your
hand is a deadly weapon, a tool of destruction that you wield with deadly
precision. With a steely gaze, you stand victorious over your fallen foe,
knowing that in this unforgiving world, only the strong will survive. The path
ahead is clear, the Great Feasting Hall beckoning you forward with the promise
of adventure and danger. As you prepare to continue on your journey, you steel
yourself for the battles that lie ahead, knowing that only the strong will
emerge victorious in this harsh and unforgiving world.
Guard dropped the key in the Courtyard.

The guard, now unconscious on the ground, drops a key from their belt. It glints
in the moonlight, a small but significant prize for your victory. The courtyard
is silent, the only sound the soft rustling of leaves in the night breeze. The
key is a symbol of your triumph, a reminder that in this unforgiving world,
strength and determination will always prevail. With a steely gaze, you pick up
the key, feeling its weight in your hand as you prepare to continue on your
journey. The path ahead is clear, the Great Feasting Hall beckoning you forward
with the promise of adventure and danger. As you pocket the key, you steel
yourself for the challenges that lie ahead, knowing that only the strong will
emerge victorious in this harsh and unforgiving world.
Guard dropped the sword in the Courtyard.

The guard, now unconscious on the ground, drops their sword with a clatter. It
lies there, gleaming in the moonlight, a deadly weapon that has fallen into your
possession. The courtyard is silent, the only sound the soft rustling of leaves
in the night breeze. The sword is a symbol of your victory, a reminder that in
this unforgiving world, strength and skill will always triumph. With a steely
gaze, you pick up the sword, feeling its weight in your hand as you prepare to
continue on your journey. The path ahead is clear, the Great Feasting Hall
beckoning you forward with the promise of adventure and danger. As you wield the
sword, you steel yourself for the battles that lie ahead, knowing that only the
strong will emerge victorious in this harsh and unforgiving world.
get key
The player got the key.

You pick up the key, feeling its weight in your hand as you pocket it. The key
is a small but significant prize, a symbol of your victory over the guard. With
a steely gaze, you tuck the key away, knowing that it may unlock the path to
further challenges and dangers that lie ahead. The courtyard is silent, the only
sound the soft rustling of leaves in the night breeze. As you prepare to
continue on your journey, you steel yourself for the trials that await you,
knowing that only the strong will survive in this unforgiving world. The key in
your possession is a reminder of your strength and determination, a tool that
may prove invaluable in the battles that lie ahead.
go east

You stand inside the Great Feasting Hall.
Exits:
West to Courtyard
East to Throne Room

You see:
 * a strange candle
	read runes
	light candle

You find yourself in the Great Feasting Hall, the remnants of a grand banquet
scattered across the tables. The air is heavy with the scent of roasted meat and
spices, a stark reminder of the revelry and violence that has unfolded in this
place. The pole and sword in your hands are a silent promise of the destruction
that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's
notice. The strange candle on the table catches your eye, its flickering flame
casting eerie shadows on the walls. With a steely gaze, you approach the candle,
curious about the mysterious runes inscribed on its surface. As you read the
runes, a sense of foreboding washes over you, a warning of the dangers that lie
ahead. With a steady hand, you reach out to light the candle, knowing that its
flame may hold the key to unlocking the secrets of this dark and treacherous
place.
get candle
The player got the candle.

You pick up the strange candle, feeling its weight in your hand as you examine
the mysterious runes inscribed on its surface. The flickering flame casts eerie
shadows on the walls of the Great Feasting Hall, a reminder of the darkness that
lurks in this place. With a steely gaze, you tuck the candle away, knowing that
its flame may hold the key to unlocking the secrets of this treacherous world.
The pole and sword in your hands are a silent promise of the destruction that
you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. As
you prepare to continue on your journey, you steel yourself for the challenges
that lie ahead, knowing that only the strong will survive in this unforgiving
world. The candle in your possession is a symbol of the mysteries that await
you, a tool that may shed light on the darkness that surrounds you.
go west

You are in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Drawbridge
Up to Tower Stairs
Down to Dungeon Stairs
East to Great Feasting Hall

You see:
 * a short sword
Characters:
 * A castle guard

You find yourself back in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE, the moonlight casting
long shadows across the cobblestones. The air is heavy with the scent of
violence and danger, a reminder of the battles that have unfolded in this place.
The pole and sword in your hands are a silent promise of the destruction that
you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. The
short sword on the ground catches your eye, its blade gleaming in the
moonlight. With a steely gaze, you approach the sword, knowing that it may prove
to be a valuable weapon in the trials that lie ahead. The castle guard eyes you
warily from a distance, a silent sentinel standing between you and the path
forward. As you prepare to continue on your journey, you steel yourself for the
challenges that await you, knowing that only the strong will survive in this
unforgiving world.
go down

You are climbing the stairs down to the dungeon.
Exits:
Up to Courtyard
Down to Dungeon

You descend the stairs into the dark and foreboding dungeon of ACTION CASTLE.
The air is thick with the stench of decay and despair, a stark contrast to the
chaos and violence that reigns above. The sound of dripping water echoes
through the stone corridors, a haunting reminder of the suffering that has
unfolded in this place. The pole and sword in your hands are a silent promise of
the destruction that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a
moment's notice. As you navigate the dimly lit passageways, you steel yourself
for the horrors that may lie in wait, knowing that danger lurks around every
corner. The dungeon is a place of darkness and despair, a grim reminder of the
cruelty and brutality that defines this unforgiving world. With a steely gaze,
you prepare to face whatever challenges come your way, knowing that only the
strong will survive in this harsh and unforgiving place.
light lamp
The player lights the lamp. It glows.

You light the lamp, its warm glow casting a flickering light in the dark and
dreary dungeon. The shadows dance on the damp stone walls, creating an eerie
atmosphere that sends shivers down your spine. The pole and sword in your hands
are illuminated by the soft light, their edges gleaming in the darkness. With a
steely gaze, you hold the lamp aloft, its light guiding your way through the
twisting corridors of the dungeon. The air is heavy with the scent of decay and
despair, a reminder of the suffering that has unfolded in this place. As you
press forward, you steel yourself for the trials that lie ahead, knowing that
only the strong will survive in this unforgiving world. The lamp in your hand is
a beacon of hope in the darkness, a symbol of your determination to overcome
whatever challenges come your way.
go down

You are in the dungeon. There is a spooky ghost here.
Exits:
Up to Dungeon Stairs


Characters:
 * A ghost with bony, claw-like fingers and who is wearing a crown.

You find yourself face to face with a spooky ghost in the dark and eerie
dungeon of ACTION CASTLE. The ghost's bony, claw-like fingers reach out towards
you, its hollow eyes filled with malice and despair. It wears a crown on its
head, a grim reminder of the royalty that once ruled this cursed place. The lamp
in your hand flickers in the ghostly presence, casting a dim light on the
apparition before you. The pole and sword in your hands are a silent promise of
the destruction that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a
moment's notice. With a steely gaze, you prepare to face this spectral foe,
knowing that only the strong will survive in this haunted and unforgiving
world. The ghost's chilling presence sends a shiver down your spine, a reminder
of the horrors that lurk in the shadows. As you steel yourself for the battle
that is about to unfold, you know that your skills and determination will be
put to the test in this dark and treacherous place.
light candle
The player lights the candle. It glows.

You light the candle, its flickering flame casting a warm glow in the dark and
haunting dungeon. The shadows dance on the damp stone walls, creating an eerie
atmosphere that adds to the ghostly presence before you. The pole and sword in
your hands are illuminated by the soft light, their edges gleaming in the
darkness. With a steely gaze, you hold the candle aloft, its light pushing back
the darkness that surrounds you. The air is heavy with the scent of decay and
despair, a reminder of the suffering that has unfolded in this place. As you
face the spooky ghost with its bony, claw-like fingers and crown, you steel
yourself for the battle that is about to unfold, knowing that only the strong
will survive in this haunted and unforgiving world. The candle in your hand is a
beacon of hope in the darkness, a symbol of your determination to overcome
whatever challenges come your way.
read runes
The player holds aloft the glowing candle cofered in strange runes. The odd runes are an exorcism ritual to dispel evil spirits.

You hold the glowing candle aloft, its light illuminating the strange runes
inscribed on its surface. As you read the odd symbols, you realize that they are
an exorcism ritual to dispel evil spirits. The candle's flame flickers and
dances, casting a warm glow on the ghostly figure before you. With a steely
gaze, you recite the incantation, the words echoing through the dungeon with
power and authority. The ghost recoils in pain, its form wavering and fading
before your eyes. The bony, claw-like fingers reach out towards you one last
time before the ghost vanishes into thin air, its haunting presence dispelled
by the power of the exorcism ritual. With a sense of relief, you lower the
candle, the light casting a soft glow in the now empty dungeon. The pole and
sword in your hands are a silent reminder of the violence that you are capable
of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. As you stand
victorious over the defeated ghost, you know that only the strong will survive
in this haunted and unforgiving world. The candle in your hand is a symbol of
your triumph
Ghost dropped the crown in the Dungeon.

The ghost, now vanquished, drops its crown on the cold stone floor of the
dungeon. The crown gleams in the candlelight, a symbol of the royalty that once
ruled this cursed place. The air is heavy with the scent of decay and despair, a
reminder of the suffering that has unfolded in this haunted dungeon. With a
steely gaze, you pick up the crown, feeling its weight in your hand as you
examine the intricate design. The pole and sword in your hands are a silent
promise of the destruction that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to
strike at a moment's notice. As you pocket the crown, you know that it may hold
the key to unlocking the secrets of this dark and treacherous place. The dungeon
is silent now, the only sound the soft flickering of the candle as it casts
shadows on the walls. As you prepare to continue on your journey, you steel
yourself for the challenges that lie ahead, knowing that only the strong will
survive in this unforgiving world.
ghost is banished

The ghost lets out a blood-curdling scream as it is banished from the dungeon,
its form dissipating into nothingness. The air grows still and quiet, the only
sound the soft flickering of the candle as it casts a warm glow in the darkness.
With a sense of relief, you lower the candle, the light illuminating the now
empty dungeon. The pole and sword in your hands are a silent reminder of the
violence that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a
moment's notice. As you stand victorious over the defeated ghost, you know that
only the strong will survive in this haunted and unforgiving world. The candle
in your hand is a symbol of your triumph, a beacon of hope in the darkness that
surrounds you. With a steely gaze, you prepare to continue on your journey,
knowing that the path ahead is fraught with danger and uncertainty, but that you
are ready to face whatever challenges come your way.
get crown
The player got the crown.

You pick up the crown, feeling its weight in your hand as you examine the
intricate design. The crown gleams in the candlelight, a symbol of the royalty
that once ruled this cursed place. The air is heavy with the scent of decay and
despair, a reminder of the suffering that has unfolded in this haunted dungeon.
With a steely gaze, you tuck the crown away, knowing that it may hold the key to
unlocking the secrets of this dark and treacherous world. The pole and sword in
your hands are a silent promise of the destruction that you are capable of,
weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. As you prepare to
continue on your journey, you steel yourself for the challenges that lie ahead,
knowing that only the strong will survive in this unforgiving world. The crown
in your possession is a symbol of your triumph, a reminder of the power and
authority that you wield in this haunted and dangerous place.
go up, go up, go up
go up

You are climbing the stairs down to the dungeon.
Exits:
Up to Courtyard
Down to Dungeon

You ascend the stairs from the dark and foreboding dungeon back to the
courtyard of ACTION CASTLE. The air is cool and crisp, a welcome contrast to the
stale and musty atmosphere of the dungeon below. The pole and sword in your
hands are a silent reminder of the violence that you are capable of, weapons
that
stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. As you emerge from the depths of the
dungeon, you feel a sense of relief wash over you, knowing that you have
survived the trials that awaited you in that haunted place. The courtyard is
silent, the only sound the soft rustling of leaves in the night breeze. With a
steely gaze, you prepare to continue on your journey, knowing that the path
ahead is fraught with danger and uncertainty. The pole and sword in your hands
are a constant reminder of the violence that you are capable of, weapons that
stand ready to strike down any who dare to stand in your way.
go up

You are in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE.
Exits:
West to Drawbridge
Up to Tower Stairs
Down to Dungeon Stairs
East to Great Feasting Hall

You see:
 * a short sword
Characters:
 * A castle guard

You stand in the courtyard of ACTION CASTLE, the moonlight casting a silvery
glow over the cobblestones. The air is filled with a sense of anticipation, a
reminder of the dangers and challenges that lie ahead. The pole and sword in
your hands are a silent promise of the destruction that you are capable of,
weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. The short sword on the
ground catches your eye, its blade gleaming in the moonlight. With a steely
gaze, you approach the sword, knowing that it may prove to be a valuable weapon
in the trials that lie ahead. The castle guard eyes you warily from a distance,
a silent sentinel standing between you and the path forward. As you prepare to
continue on your journey, you steel yourself for the challenges that await you,
knowing that only the strong will survive in this unforgiving world.
go up

You are climbing the stairs to the tower. There is a locked door here.
Exits:
Down to Courtyard
Up to Tower

You see:
 * a door
	unlock door

You ascend the stairs to the tower, the air growing colder and more ominous as
you climb higher. The sound of your footsteps echoes through the narrow
passageway, a reminder of the solitude and danger that surrounds you. The pole
and sword in your hands are a silent promise of the destruction that you are
capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. As you
reach the top of the stairs, you come face to face with a locked door, its
surface cold and unyielding. With a steely gaze, you approach the door,
determined to unlock whatever secrets lie beyond. The key you obtained earlier
burns a hole in your pocket, a reminder of the challenges that you have faced
and the trials that still await you. As you prepare to unlock the door and
continue on your journey, you steel yourself for the dangers that lie ahead,
knowing that only the strong will survive in this unforgiving world.
unlock door
The player unlocked the door

You insert the key into the lock and turn it with a satisfying click. The door
swings open, revealing a dark and mysterious room beyond. The air is heavy with
the scent of ancient dust and decay, a stark contrast to the cold stone walls
that surround you. The pole and sword in your hands are a silent promise of the
destruction that you are capable of, weapons that stand ready to strike at a
moment's notice. With a steely gaze, you step through the doorway, ready to
face whatever challenges lie ahead in this hidden chamber. The key in your hand
is a symbol of your determination and resourcefulness, a tool that has unlocked
the path to further mysteries and dangers. As you prepare to explore this new
area, you steel yourself for the trials that await you, knowing that only the
strong will survive in this unforgiving world.
go up

You are inside a tower.
Exits:
Down to Tower Stairs


Characters:
 * A princess who is beautiful and lonely. She awaits her non-gender-stereotypical soulmate.

You find yourself inside the tower, the air heavy with a sense of solitude and
mystery. The room is dimly lit, the only source of light coming from a small
window that offers a glimpse of the moonlit night sky. The pole and sword in
your hands are a silent reminder of the violence that you are capable of,
weapons that stand ready to strike at a moment's notice. As you take in your
surroundings, you notice a figure standing in the shadows - a princess,
beautiful
and lonely, awaiting her non-gender-stereotypical soulmate. Her eyes meet yours,
filled with a mixture of hope and longing. With a steely gaze, you approach the
princess, ready to face whatever challenges come your way. The princess is a
symbol of grace and beauty in this dark and treacherous world, a reminder that
even in the midst of chaos and violence, there is still room for love and
compassion. As you stand before her, you know that your actions will determine

mercenaries. With precise shots, you take down the attackers one by one, their
bodies falling to the ground in a bloody heap. The princess looks at you with

heart pounding with adrenaline. The princess, now safe in your arms, whispers
